name: Bullet control (GlerG)
description:
Switch between controlling your character and the bullets trying to kill you in this difficult bullet hell.

this game was made in 7 hours (Because I missed the start date) for the GMTK game jam https://itch.io/jam/gmtk-2020 but I had a lot of trouble with compiling my game into an exe so I had to enter GMTK Deadline Missers Jam https://itch.io/jam/gmtk-deadline-missers-jam

Sorry I didn't have time for any sort of tutorial, but you can always read the how to play.txt file if you're confused
